import React, {useContext} from "react"; import {MyContext} from "./MyContext"; import Card from "./Card"; function CreateAccount() { const { //state firstName, lastName, email, password, nameError, emailError, passwError, successfullAccountMessageVisible, //functions handleClick, handleFirstNameChange, handleLastNameChange, handleEmailChange, handlePasswordChange, clearForm } = useContext(MyContext); return (
Open an account that fits your needs!
{nameError}
{emailError}
{passwError}
First Name
Last Name

Email address

Password

):( //if visible, hide "previous page", show success msg and "add another account" <>
Account succesfully created!
)} /> ) } export default CreateAccount;
